Dialogue.Value: Aren’t you running late?,Let’s hurry to school!
Why not talk to your friends,until class starts?
To the PC Room!,I have to beat Remilia’s Navi!
C’mon， let’s go home!,There’s treasure to be found,on the net!
You’re the kind of girl that tells,her parents when she comes,home， right?
C’mon! Jack into your,computer with R so we,can go treasure hunting!
Let’s go look for the treasure,in Genso Area!
I wanna eat some cyber ice,cream!
Mama just screamed!,Something must’ve happened,in the living room!
Alice! Jack into the fridge!
There’s nothing at home that,can melt the ice! I need to ask,someone else for help!
Now that I have this,antifreeze....!,I can melt the ice!
I’m tiiiiiired〜!,Wanna go to bed?
Let’s head to the PC Room,for my examination.,....Not that I want to.
Let’s ask Mari if we can,meet Dr. Morichika!
Let’s head to Campus Square,and get a student metro pass!
Let’s go find the metro pass,Navi!
Don’t you think we should go,meet our friends at the station?
Dr. Morichika’s lab is in Genso,University! Let’s go!
Run the AddOn Manager,from my ability screen.
We came all the way to the lab，,so let’s take a look around!
That Remilia....,Where’d she run off to?,Let’s go find her.
Let’s go get the Navi that,Kumami lent to Ms. Koa.
I’m fine messin’ around，but,you can jack out whenever.
We gotta look for Dr. Morichika,and Remilia at the University!
We gotta find the source of,this bad air!
Quickly!,Jack into the air purifier!
Let’s hurry to Dr. Morichika’s,lab!
The office is across the hall,from Dr. Morichika’s lab!
Remilia is in the lab on the,third floor!,Let’s get going!
Let’s go to the lab and ask,Dr. Morichika about our,compressed data!!
Let’s try to find the key on the,net!
A place with many kids， and in,a comp with many books?,Sound familiar to you?
Let’s go back to the professor,and report our results!
Let’s go try out my new,abilities at the Central City,Game Center!
Let’s follow those guys!,They went outside!
Let’s go to school!
Let’s gather info on the net,about taming viruses!
The key to virus taming is in,the Undernet! Let’s get going!
Let’s get a way to tame,viruses from Henchie in,the UnderSquare.
Jack in to the board so we can,stop the electric current!
We’ve got to find a way to get,out of the classroom!
Jack in to the board so we can,stop the electric current!
Let’s get out of the classroom!
Let’s jack into the server in the,Staff Room!
Jack into the card reader,near the Storage Room!
I have to restart the frozen,computer in the Storage Room!
Let’s go sign up for the,N1 League in Eien Square!
C’mon， Alice!,Jack in so we can finish the,N1 qualifiers!
Let’s go back to Eien Square,and tell them I won!
Tenshi was waiting for you,in your room.
Let’s ride the metro to,Eien Town!
Wasn’t the Agent Center,in Block 1 of Eien Town?
Let’s look around the,Agent Center!
We’re going to the Hakurei,Shrine， right? It’s right up the,stairs near the metro station.
Go to Dr. Morichika’s lab!,Hurry!
Time for the N1 League main,event!,Let’s go to the Game Center!
Let’s tell the N1 staff we’re,ready to win and move on,to the next round!
You need to go to the,Agent Center with Tenshi.
Weren’t we going to the,Hakurei Shrine? You two,really seem to like it.
Jack into the donation box,before the fire spreads to the,shrine!
Let’s go visit Tenshi at the,hospital in Eien Town.
I’m glad that Tenshi looked,okay. Let’s wrap things up and,go home.
Let’s go to the Genso train line,next to the Game Center and,take the train to the harbor!
Let’s go to our room first.,The man said it was Room,103 on the third floor.
Let’s go look around the,mall on the second floor.
Let’s go look at shops with,Reisen!
Wasn’t the showroom,supposed to open soon?
Let’s take a look around the,showroom!
Let’s go back to our room,and take a break.,We’re in Room 103.
Hey， let’s go fight in the,the Exhibition Battle in the,Banquet Hall!
Shanghai’s not here， so I,guess I should just go back,to my room....
Let’s head to the bridge,before the ship crashes,into the reef〜!
What are you waiting for〜?,Jack into the control system,in the bridge〜!
Let’s go back to our room,and rest a while.
Let’s get off the boat and go,on our Engelles tour!
Let’s head to the hotel in,downtown Engelles.
Let’s jack into the Internet,and ask around about tourist,attractions!
Let’s leave the hotel and,go sightseeing outside.
Let’s go sightseeing with,Wriggle in downtown Engelles.
Shanghai， please hurry....
Get to the top of the clocktower,and help Wriggle!
Let’s go hand out souveniers,to your friends!
Let’s head home and talk to,Mama!
Go to Genso Square to get,some rice.
Jack in and annihilate the,black Navis!
Jack in so we can start,checking out the Undernet.
Head to the Agent Center and,hear the story about the black,Navi.
Let’s find Henchie where we,last saw him in Undernet 2.
We should go to Central City,to visit Border Concern!
Let’s visit Dr. Morichika at the,Agent Center.
Do you want to talk to Remilia?,She’s rich.
Head to the chip shop to talk,to Kumami!
Alice! Let’s start looking for a,stealth machine!
When you’re ready，take the,station in Central City’s East,District to the airfield.
Jack in to the controls of the,operating table!
Let's smash up ROM's base!
Get back to ROM’s base from,Central City East!
ERROR - PLAYER SHOULD,ONLY BE SHANGHAI ON,FINAL FLOOR
Today’s a great day to go,exploring!
If we’re looking for rumors about,“Heaven”，I bet the Undernet,will have plenty.
We need to find out what’s,behind that platform in Undernet,7!
Let’s keep exploring that weird,garden in the Undernet.
Let’s go see what the Sage,knows about that door blocking,the way.
The Sage better have some,answers for us once we’re done,with all his errands.
I really don’t feel like talking,right now，Alice.
Just....,Just open that door in the,Heaven Area.
